title: Freeze!

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "freeze!" onto the switch.
• Play some music and dance.
• When the switch user presses the switch, pause the music and everyone must stop dancing.
• Restart the music after a 5 second pause.

tooltipText: A game of musical statues, the switch user orders everyone to "freeze!" and music automatically restarts after 5 seconds
